Package edu.odu.cs.cs350.pne

Class Parser

java.lang.Object
edu.odu.cs.cs350.pne.Parser
public class Parser extends Object
A class created for the purpose of performing complex parsing functions on a document's raw text, such as removing punctuation and making all words all lowercase

    Modifier and Type
    Method

    static void
    pruneStopList(Document doc, StopList stop)
    Given a list of forbidden words, this removes any and all instances of said words from the raw text in a document

    Removes all punctuation from the raw text in a document (within reason)
    static String

    Removes all punctuation from a single word (within reason)

    • pruneStopList

      public static void pruneStopList(Document doc, StopList stop)
      Given a list of forbidden words, this removes any and all instances of said words from the raw text in a document

      stop - the list of forbidden words
